tool_description: This is a lightweight web service, (REST interface), which provides an easy way to access the YTS website.  An API (Application programming interface) is a protocol intended to be used as an interface by software components to communicate with each other.  Our API supports many methods, so there should not be a problem coding some nice applications.
name: YTS.am Torrent
title: YTS.am Torrent

api_list.name: List Movies (XML)
api_list.description: Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Integer between 1 - 50 (inclusive): The limit of results per page that has been set

optional_parameters.name: query_term
optional_parameters.description: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title/IMDb Code, Actor Name/IMDb Code, Director Name/IMDb Code

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: String (720p, 1080p, 3D): 	Used to filter by a given quality

optional_parameters.name: minimum_rating
optional_parameters.description: Integer between 0 - 9 (inclusive): 	Used to filter movie by a given minimum IMDb rating

optional_parameters.name: with_rt_ratings
optional_parameters.description: Returns the list with the Rotten Tomatoes rating included

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Integer (Unsigned): Used to see the next page of movies, eg limit=15 and page=2 will show you movies 15-30

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: String (title, year, rating, peers, seeds, download_count, like_count, date_added): Sorts the results by choosen value

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: String (desc, asc): Orders the results by either Ascending or Descending order

api_list.name: Movie Reviews (XML)
api_list.description: Returns all the IMDb movie reviews for the specified movie

optional_parameters.name: movie_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the movie

api_list.name: Movie Details (XML)
api_list.description: Returns the information about a specific movie

optional_parameters.name: with_cast
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added information about the cast

optional_parameters.name: with_images
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added image URLs

api_list.name: Movie Suggestions (XML)
api_list.description: Returns 4 related movies as suggestions for the user

optional_parameters.name: movie_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the movie

api_list.name: Movie Details (JSONP)
api_list.description: Returns the information about a specific movie

optional_parameters.name: with_cast
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added information about the cast

optional_parameters.name: with_images
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added image URLs

api_list.name: User Details (JSON)
api_list.description: Get the user details

optional_parameters.name: with_recently_downloaded
optional_parameters.description: If set it will add the most recent downloads by the specified user

api_list.name: List Upcoming (XML)
api_list.description: Returns the 4 latest upcoming movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yts-am-torrent.p.rapidapi.com/list_upcoming.xml"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yts-am-torrent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yts-am-torrent.p.rapidapi.com/list_upcoming.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yts-am-torrent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
